title: On holomorphic $\mathbb{C}^*$-actions
abstract:
In this paper we study holomorphic actions of the complex multiplicative
group on complex manifolds around a singular (fixed) point. We prove
linearization results for the germ of action and also for the whole action
under some conditions on the manifold. This can be seen as a follow-up to
previous works of M. Suzuki and other authors.
